content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received an AI response to browse a website for the best route on the Brno Reservoir Trail, but it returned an error with no text to summarize. I then received an AI response to Google the best route, which returned multiple links.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://greatruns.com/brno-czechia-brno-reservoir-veveri-castle/", "question": "What is the distance and elevation gain of the Brno Reservoir Trail?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: providing information on running routes in the Brno Reservoir area in Czechia. The area offers approximately 8 km of decent running with rolling hills, but there is no loop trail around the entire reservoir. The top end of the reservoir around U Sirky beach is a good area to start, and there is bus access available. The text does not provide information on the distance and elevation gain of the Brno Reservoir Trail.\n\nLinks: ['About (https://greatruns.com/about/)', 'About Great Runs (https://greatruns.com/about/)', 'Great Runs Team (https://greatruns.com/great-runs-team/)', 'Working With Great Runs (https://greatruns.com/working-with-great-runs/)', 'GR in the Media (https://greatruns.com/as-seen-in/)']", type='action_result')]
"""
